If submitting a bug please make sure

- [ ] If you are using gdb
  - [ ] `gdb --version` >= 7.7.1
  - [ ] it works on the command line with `gdb`
  - [ ] `cwd` is properly set
- [ ]  If you are using lldb
  - [ ] `lldb --version` >= 3.7.1
  - [ ] it works on the command line with `lldb-mi`
  - [ ] `cwd` is properly set

Screenshots are helpful but not required
